main event: A military aircraft observed an object that exploded in a brilliant flash and disintegrated into smaller lights while flying in the sky near Libreville, Africa.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 2-3 minutes and was observed from an altitude of 25,000 to 30,000 feet., The object was round and the size of a volleyball at arm's length., Witnesses described the object as orange and reported a brilliant flash upon explosion., The crew reported the sighting to Congo Airways, indicating military acknowledgment of the event., The event is suggested to be a meteor even though it displayed unusual characteristics.
witness description: military crew members on board an aircraft
